# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a metadata identifier.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ rawValue: String)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: The raw string value.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a metadata identifier with the specified raw value.

items.description: Creates a metadata identifier with the specified raw value.
